mapper.select:
select ci.id, ci.code, ci.name, ci.content, ci.tie_id, ci.major_id, ci.grade_yaer, ci.teacher_id, ci.create_date, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, ti.name as tieName, mi.name as majorName from class_info ci left join staff_info si on (si.id = ci.teacher_id) left join tie_info ti on (ti.id = ci.tie_id) left join major_info mi on (mi.id = ci.major_id) where 1 = 1
AND ci.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{classInfo.name},'%')
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{classInfo.staffName},'%')
order by ci.create_date desc
